documents.content:
# California Real Estate License Renewal & Continuing Education (2026)

## License Validity & Renewal

### Timeline
- **License Valid:** 4 years
- **Late Renewal Window:** Up to 2 years after expiration
- **After 2 Years Late:** Must re-qualify and re-examine

### Renewal Fees
| License | On-Time | Late (150% penalty) |
|---------|---------|--------------------|
| Salesperson | $350 | $525 |
| Broker | $450 | $675 |

### Processing Times (as of January 2026)
- Currently processing mid-to-late December 2025 applications
- **Tip:** Submit renewal 60+ days before expiration

## Continuing Education Requirements (45 Hours)

### First Renewal - Specific Courses Required

**Mandatory Subjects (17 hours):**
- Ethics (3 hours)
- Agency (3 hours)
- Trust Fund Handling (3 hours)
- Risk Management (3 hours)
- Fair Housing - with interactive role-play (3 hours)
- Implicit Bias Training (2 hours) - NEW

**Broker Additional (3 hours):**
- Management and Supervision

**Consumer Protection Courses (18 hours minimum):**
- Must be DRE-approved CE courses
- Topics: Contracts, disclosures, taxation, etc.

**Remaining Hours (10 hours salesperson, 7 hours broker):**
- Any consumer service or protection courses

### Subsequent Renewals - Options

**Option 1: 9-Hour Survey Course**
- Covers all 7 mandatory subjects in one course
- Plus 18 hours consumer protection
- Plus electives to reach 45 hours

**Option 2: Individual Courses**
- Take each mandatory subject separately
- Plus consumer protection and electives

### License Verification
Verify any California real estate license:
https://www2.dre.ca.gov/publicasp/pplinfo.asp

### Official URLs
- CE Requirements: https://www.dre.ca.gov/licensees/cerequirements.html
- Renewal: https://secure.dre.ca.gov
- DRE Phone: (877) 373-4542
